title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Converted 8 JavaScript files to TypeScript by renaming and adding type annotations (e.g., function parameters, return types, interfaces).
Added explicit type definitions for schemas in `glossaries-candidates` and `glossaries-external`, replacing deleted JS files.
Introduced type safety in helper functions (e.g., `caching-headers`, `version-satisfies-range`).
Improved code with stricter checks (e.g., null handling, error throwing).
Updated test files to use TypeScript syntax and type assertions.
summary:

- Added explicit type definitions for schemas in `glossaries-candidates` and `glossaries-external`, replacing deleted JS files.
- Introduced type safety in helper functions (e.g., `caching-headers`, `version-satisfies-range`).
- Improved code with stricter checks (e.g., null handling, error throwing).
- Updated test files to use TypeScript syntax and type assertions.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Converted 8 JavaScript files to TypeScript by renaming and adding type annotations (e.g., function parameters, return types, interfaces).
- Added explicit type definitions for schemas in `glossaries-candidates` and `glossaries-external`, replacing deleted JS files.
- Introduced type safety in helper functions (e.g., `caching-headers`, `version-satisfies-range`).
- Improved code with stricter checks (e.g., null handling, error throwing).
- Updated test files to use TypeScript syntax and type assertions.

### Title
Convert JavaScript files to TypeScript with type annotations and interfaces
